channel.title: Help with agility points
channel.description: hello guys my server has agility points in such as , when you complete the course you get 15 per completion of whole course and they can build up and buy things with the points such as skilling items although say if you earn like 500 or any number then you log out or Disconnect , You lose the points and go back to 0? Does anyone know a solution for this and can someone help me resolve this please thanks for your support guys! :D

item.title: Help with agility points
item.dc:creator: @dmannn0120 dmannn0120
item.description:
@dmannn0120 wrote:

Go into your client.java… Search for this…

if (token.equals("character-height")) { heightLevel = Integer.parseInt(token2); }

or something similar to that… Below that declare this…

else if (token.equals("character-agilityPoints")) { agilityPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2); }

Then search for this…

characterfile.write("character-height = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(heightLevel), 0, Integer .toString(heightLevel).length()); characterfile.newLine();

or something similar… Then declare this below that…

characterfile.write("character-agilityPoints = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(agilityPoints), 0, Integer.toString(agilityPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();

In your player.java class declare this…

Should now work… Hope I helped you.

Read full topic
